Name: Mummy cartonnage
Description: Cartonnage, nearly rectangular in shape. At the top, a kneeling feminine divinity is represented, facing right, with outspread wings. On her head, she is wearing a solar disc and she is holding the Maat feather in her outstretched hands. Underneath, a design of rows of beads alternating with lotus flowers. Flanking these are the four Sons of Horus (Hepi and Qebehsenuf on the left; Duamutef and Amset on the right), in profile, facing inward. In the middle, there is a vertical column for inscription.
